r.s: Provides missing functionality for older versions of PHP
r.d: PHP_Compat provides missing functionality in the form of Constants and Functions for older versions of PHP.
r.n: Added more components: * str_word_count * str_rot13 * convert_uuencode * convert_uudecode * strpbrk * array_walk_recursive * array_uintersect_assoc * array_uintersect_uassoc * array_uintersect * array_udiff_uassoc * str_shuffle * substr_compare * get_include_path * set_include_path * restore_include_path * php_strip_whitespace
